title: Suriya Anushka Shruti Haasan Si3 worldwide collections crosses Rs 108 crores and 43 crs from Tn - Tamil Movie News
text: Suriya and dir Hari to deliver two more films We had reported earlier that Suriya's 'Si3' has been continuing its successful run in Chennai after completing three weekends with good theater occupancy and collections. Now we bring you the complete details of the collections grossed by the Hari directed flick from across the world. In Tamil Nadu 'Si3' that released on February 9, 2017 has collected a whopping Rs.43 crores until February last week. In Andhra Pradesh where Suriya commands a huge box office share and where the film was released in Telugu version, the film has collected Rs.21 crores. In Kerala the collection figure stands at Rs.8.3 crores.. In Karnataka 'Si3 released in a record number of screens and has been successful all over as the film has collected Rs.9.7 crores which is a whopping amount for a Tamil film. The lowest amount out of the lot comes from North India where the film has done a business up to Rs.1.5 crores. In the overseas market this third installment of the blockbuster 'Singam' series has collected around Rs.25 crores. With this the total worldwide collections made by the film so far has crossed the magical 100 crore mark. The total collection is Rs.108.5 crore out of which the distributors share is said to be somewhere above Rs.60 crores.
